TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReplicationNeighbor extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The ReplicationNeighbor class contains information about a replication neighbor of an or object.
Gets the number of replication failures since the last successful replication cycle.
Docs.value: The number of failed replication attempts from this source since the last successful replication attempt. If no previous attempt was successful, the return value is the number of failed replication attempts since the source was added as a neighbor.
Docs.returns: The number of failed replication attempts from this source since the last successful replication attempt. If no previous attempt was successful, the return value is the number of failed replication attempts since the source was added as a neighbor.

Docs.summary: Gets the time of the last replication attempt from this source.
Docs.value: The time of the last replication attempt. If no replication attempt occurred, the value is zero.
Docs.returns: The time of the last replication attempt. If no replication attempt occurred, the value is zero.

Docs.summary: Gets the time of the last successful replication cycle from this source.
Docs.value: The time of the last successful synchronization. If no replication succeeded, the value is zero.
Docs.returns: The time of the last successful synchronization. If no replication succeeded, the value is zero.

Docs.summary: Gets the message that is associated with the last replication attempt from this source.
Docs.value: The message that corresponds to the last replication attempt. If the last attempt succeeded, the value is an empty string.
Docs.returns: The message that corresponds to the last replication attempt. If the last attempt succeeded, the value is an empty string.

Docs.summary: Gets the error code that is associated with the last replication attempt from this source.
Docs.value: The error code for the last replication attempt. If the last attempt succeeded, the value is ERROR_SUCCESS.
Docs.returns: The error code for the last replication attempt. If the last attempt succeeded, the value is ERROR_SUCCESS.

Docs.summary: Gets the partition name for this object.
Docs.value: The name of the partition for this object.
Docs.returns: The name of the partition for this object.

Docs.summary: Gets the attribute and object settings for this object.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighbor.ReplicationNeighborOptions> value that contains the attribute and option settings for this object.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighbor.ReplicationNeighborOptions> value that contains the attribute and option settings for this object.

Docs.summary: Gets the invocation identifier that was used by the replication source server in the last replication attempt.
Docs.value: The invocation identifier that was used by the replication source server in the last replication attempt.
Docs.returns: The invocation identifier that was used by the replication source server in the last replication attempt.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the replication source server.
Docs.value: The name of the replication source server.
Docs.returns: The name of the replication source server.

Docs.summary: Gets the transport type that was used for replication.
Docs.value: A enumeration value that indicates the transport type that was used for the replication connection.
Docs.returns: A enumeration value that indicates the transport type that was used for the replication connection.

Docs.summary: Gets the update sequence number (USN) value for the last successful replication cycle.
Docs.value: The USN value for the last successful replication cycle. If no replication succeeded, the value is zero.
Docs.returns: The USN value for the last successful replication cycle. If no replication succeeded, the value is zero.

Docs.summary: Gets the update sequence number (USN) of the last object update that was received.
Docs.value: The USN of the last update that was received.
Docs.returns: The USN of the last update that was received.
